body: AT age 33, Nathan Kipe had outgrown the post-collegiate lifestyle he led in ultratrendy Williamsburg, Brooklyn. He paid just $590 a month for a windowless bedroom in an apartment he shared with two friends. In their noisy industrial building, bands practiced in the hallways at all hours.
